All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Represents an administrator user with elevated permissions within the ChicksEvent app.
AdminHomeFragment
A Fragment subclass representing the admin home screen.
AdminRemoveOrganizerTest
Unit tests for US 03.07.01: As an administrator I want to remove organizers that violate app policy.
AdminTest
Unit tests for Admin.
CancelledListFragment
Fragment displaying a list of cancelled entrants for a specific event, allowing the organizer to view entrants by status and send notifications.
CancelledListFragmentTest
Unit tests for CancelledListFragment cancel list functionality.
ChosenListFragment
Fragment displaying the list of entrants who have been selected (invited) for an event.
CreateEventFragment
Fragment that provides the user interface for creating a new event in the ChicksEvent app.
CsvExportHelper
 
CsvExportTest
A PURE and SIMPLE unit test for the CSV export URL generation logic.
Entrant
Represents an entrant (participant) within the ChicksEvent system.
EntrantAdapter
Adapter that binds Entrant objects to a ListView for display.
EntrantAdapterCancelTest
Unit tests for EntrantAdapter cancel logic.
EntrantJoinWaitlistTest
Unit tests for US 01.06.02: As an entrant I want to be able to join the waitlist from the event details.

Fragment that displays a map showing locations where entrants joined the waiting list.
EntrantLocationMapFragment.EntrantMarkerData
Data class to hold entrant information for map markers.
EntrantLocationTest
Unit tests for Entrant location functionality.
EntrantStatus
Enumeration representing the participation status of an entrant in an event.
EntrantTest
Robust unit tests for Entrant (no real Firebase, no Android main thread).
Event
Domain model representing an event stored in Firebase Realtime Database.
EventAdapter
Custom EventAdapter subclass for displaying events
EventAdapter.OnItemButtonClickListener
Interface defining a callback when a button inside a list item is clicked.

Unit tests for US 02.04.02: As an organizer I want to update an event poster to provide visual information to entrants.

Unit tests for US 02.04.01: As an organizer I want to upload an event poster to the event details page to provide visual information to entrants.
EventQRCodeTest
Unit tests for US 02.01.01: As an organizer I want to create a new event and generate a unique promotional QR code that links to the event description and event poster in the app.

Unit tests for Event.

Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FinalListFragment
Fragment displaying a list of accepted entrants for a specific event, allowing the organizer to view entrants by status and send notifications.
FinalListFragmentTest
Unit tests for FinalListFragment final list functionality.

Utility service class that wraps Firebase Realtime Database operations for a specific root node.
FirebaseStorageHelper
Helper class for Firebase Storage operations.

Custom ArrayAdapter subclass for displaying events hosted by the current organizer.

The main entry point of the ChicksEvent application.

Enumeration representing the different types of notifications that can be sent to users in the ChicksEvent application.

Fragment that displays a list of all organizers in the system for administrative management.
Organizer
Represents an organizer user who manages events and their waiting lists.
OrganizerAdapter
A RecyclerView.Adapter that displays a list of Organizer objects in a RecyclerView, with support for deleting individual organizers via a button.
OrganizerAdapter.OnBanToggleClickListener
Callback interface for handling ban/unban toggle switch changes on organizer items.
OrganizerAdapter.ViewHolder
A RecyclerView.ViewHolder that represents a single organizer item in the list.
OrganizerEntrantLocationTest
Unit tests for US 02.02.02: As an organizer I want to see on a map where entrants joined my event waiting list from.
OrganizerNotifTest
Unit tests for Organizer related to user story US 02.07.02: "As an organizer I want to send notifications to all selected entrants."
OrganizerTest
Unit tests for Organizer.
PoolingFragment
Fragment for running a lottery ("pooling") and displaying selected entrants for a given event.
PoolingReplacementTest
Unit tests for Lottery replacement applicant functionality.
ProfileAdminFragment
Fragment that displays and manages a list of entrants for an admin user.
ProfileFragment
Fragment responsible for displaying and editing the current user's profile.

Fragment that displays the QR code for an event.
QRCodeGenerator

TEST31_US020703_OrganizerNotifToCancelledUITest
UI tests for US 02.07.03: As an organizer I want to send a notification to all cancelled entrants These instrumented tests verify that: Organizers can access the CancelledListFragment UI The "Send Cancelled List Notification" button is visible and enabled Tapping the button opens a dialog titled "Send Cancelled List Notification" The dialog displays both "OK" and "Cancel" actions The dialog dismisses correctly when "Cancel" is pressed The dialog dismisses correctly when "OK" is pressed (confirming the action) Note: For reliable test execution, it's recommended to disable animations on the test device/emulator before running these tests:

Fragment that displays and allows navigation from an event update screen.

Domain model representing an app user and related operations.

Callback interface for handling delete button clicks on entrant items.

RecyclerView.ViewHolder subclass that represents a single list item view.

Unit tests for User.

Represents a waiting list for a specific event.
